text: François Couchepin (19 January 1935 – 23 February 2023) is a Swiss lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Free Democratic Party of Switzerland (FDP). He was the 13th Chancellor of Switzerland from 1991 to 1999. Couchepin died on 23 February 2023, at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hls- dhs-dss.ch * Bk.admin.ch Category:Federal Chancellors of Switzerland Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Martigny District Category:People from Valais
title: François Couchepin
